successes.title: The Undress- Change clothes in public without getting naked!
successes.description: The Undress - A dress with super powers.

Pledges.description: FOUNDING FAMILY:  Your name is added to the Founders Family page of our website!  You will receive a special Thank You email, and access to a Exclusive Video because you are awesome!  *applies to anyone pledging $5 or more!
T-SHIRT: "The Undress - Founders Family" fitted T-shirt, exclusive only for Kickstarter!  You can show your support at your next workout!
THE SUPER SHAWL:  One Super Shawl in any available color of your choice! (One size only. Already includes shipping to the USA!) *add for international.
EARLY BIRD SPECIAL!- THE UNDRESS: Receive One (1) The Undress in any available size and color of your choice.
(Save from the $75 MSRP and already includes shipping to the USA! )
THE UNDRESS: Receive The Undress in any available size and color of your choice.
(Save from the $75 MSRP and already includes shipping to the USA! )
THE UNDRESS: Receive The Undress in any available size and color of your choice.
(Save from the $75 MSRP and already includes shipping to the USA! For INTERNATIONAL ECONOMY SHIPPING WORLDWIDE add $20)

(*INTERNATIONAL ONLY*) - THE UNDRESS, ECONOMY SHIPPING WORLDWIDE!: Receive The Undress in any available size and color of your choice. International Economy USPS shipping already included.  To receive more than one of The Undress, please add $69 each during checkout (ex. Two for $158, Three for $227, Four for $296)

THE UNDRESS + SUPER SHAWL:  Receive The Undress in size and color of your choice, PLUS One (1) matching Super Shawl!  Already includes shipping to the USA.
($120 Total Value, you save $25!)

THE UNDRESS + SUPER SHAWL + SHIRT:
Receive The Undress, in any available sizes and colors of your choice,  PLUS One matching Super Shawl and One T-shirt!
Already includes shipping to the USA.
($150 Value, you save $35!)
2 x THE UNDRESS:  Receive Two of The Undress' in any available size and color of your choice.  Already includes shipping to the USA. ($160 Value, you save $25!)

2 x THE UNDRESS + SHAWLS + SHIRT:
Receive Two of The Undress', in any available sizes and colors of your choice, PLUS Two matching Super Shawls and One T-shirt!
Already includes shipping to the USA. 
($260 Value, you save $61!)

3 x THE UNDRESS:  Receive Three of The Undress' in any available size and color of your choice.  Your name is added to the SILVER Section of the Founders Family page of our website!  Already includes shipping to the USA. (For INTERNATIONAL ECONOMY SHIPPING WORLDWIDE add $20)
